text: good afternoon everyone I'm going to
call to order this regularly scheduled
meeting of the public works and
infrastructure committee for January 5th
2023 Happy New Year I am Andrew Johnson
the chair of this committee and at this
time I'll ask the clerk to call the roll
so we can verify that we have a forum
council member Payne is absent wantsly
president
is absent Vice chairkovski present chair
Johnson present there are four members
present let the record reflect that we
have a quorum and with that the agenda
is before us today we have five items on
consent the first is a contract
Amendment with MnDOT for Signal timing
maintenance for the traffic signals at
Industrial Boulevard and 35W the second
is a Grant application with the U.S
Department of Transportation for an open
data approach to curbside management the
third is a Grant application as well
with the U.S EPA for solid waste
infrastructure for a recycling grant
program the fourth item is the Grant
application to FEMA for the building
resilient infrastructure and communities
program and the fifth item is the
capital Improvement program Revenue
reallocation appropriation and
adjustments with that I will see if any
committee members have any questions or
comments on these items that I will go
ahead and move for approval
not seeing any all those in favor please
say aye aye those opposed say nay that
motion carries and with that we have
completed all business before our
committee and we stand adjourned all
however I see councilmember Payne uh is
has joined us to let the record reflect
that council member Payne is a committee
as well and councilmember Payne would
you like to vote eye on the consents I
would thank you and he would like I as
well so uh with that uh we will declare
this meeting adjourn thank you thank you
